pageProduct.name: Wagner Professional Ferro-Sustain 30 Modified Release Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Modified release iron tablets for the mangement of iron deficiency anaemia and associated symptoms of tiredness , fatigue and lack of concentration .

Warnings

Warning: do not take this medicine longer than 12 months except on medical advice.  Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

The prduct is use for iron deficiency and iron deficincy aneamia and to relieve, reduce and cure the symptoms associated with iron deficiency aneamia such as tiredness, fatigue, headaches , dizziness or light headedness, lack of abilty to concentrate , feeling cold and clamy , shortness of breath and lack of energy.

Ingredients

Active ingredient is  ferrous sulfate which is the only form of iron that is easily absorbed by the body to improve the symptoms associated with iron deficiency anaemia.

Directions

Take one tablet daily whole or as directed by physician, do not break, crush or chew.
